title: LET'S WORKS TOGETHER
comment: For new business inquiries contact us at

title: WE ARE UNFORGETTABLE
CONTENT CREATORS
comment: Who are always looking for new trends.

In 2001, Hong Won-Ki and Kim Jun-Hong co-founded Zanybros, a music video production company, and now it has become the largest production company in Korea having executed more than 1,000 successful video productions.
And now, ZANYBROS has been expanding its business field to Entertainment Contents Media Group by creating ZANY-TV, its own content creation channel producing new media contents.

title: WE GOT RID OF
THE WORLD'S CREATIVITY BOUNDARIES
AND PRESENT YOU A NEW PERSPECTIVE
comment: By crossing continent barriers, language, and cultural boundaries,
We are presenting new creatives by developing our talented staff with skills needed for conceptual planning, production, post-production, and visual effects.

title: WE LEAD CHANGING TRENDS
AND TECHNOLOGIES EVERY DAY.
comment: Trends and technologies change every day, but we have been using this changes as opportunities.
While enjoying new things, we also like to share ideas, inspiring artists and the public.
In order to do our next greatest work, we keep evolving, embracing new technologies & new ways of thinking

title: ASIA NO.1
GLOBAL ENTERTAINMENT CONTENTS
MEDIA GROUP
comment: In 2013, ZANYBROS’s first overseas base, called ZACS (ZANYBROS COMMUNICATIONS) was established in Japan and started overseas business.
Following the goal of becoming Asia’s NO 1 Global Ent Content media group, In 2015, the Global Intern-Ship Program was started in order to promote and develop global talent.
More recently, in October 2017, ZANYBROS's Chinese subsidiary, Jiaxing Shanghai Cultural Transformation Co., Ltd., was set up to take over the global market.
RED DOT AWARD  WINNER - SAMSUNG NOTEBOOK9
SORIBADA K MUSIC AWARD BEST MUSICVIDEO WINNER - ZANYBROS
ASIA NEW SONG RANKING AWARD BEST MUSIC VIDEO OF  THE YEAR - SNH48 夢想島
Soompi Award  BEST HANRYU WINNER - ZANYBROS
MNET ASIA MUSIC AWARD BEST MUSIC VIDEO OF  THE YEAR - 2PM WINNER
ROLLING STONES MAGAZINE BEST MUSIC VIDEO NO.5 IN THE WORLD - HYUNA RED
YOUTUBE AWARD BEST MUSICVIDEO WINNER - Girl’s generation I GOT A BOY
MNET ASIA MUSIC AWARD BEST DIRECTOR OF  THE YEAR WINNER - HONG WONKI

title: ZANYBROS co.ltd
KOREA
comment: 2ND FLOOR TYTEX B/D, 64-24 NONHYUN-DONG, GANGNAM-GU, SEOUL KOREA
zanybros75@gmail.com

title: ZANYBROS COMMUNICATIONS
JAPAN
comment: #707 3-7-1 NISHIGOTANDA, SHINAGAWA-KU, TOKYO JAPAN ZIP 141-0031
nomura1974@gmail.com

title: MEDIA
PRODUCTION
comment: We have been producing more than 100 films per year, totaling more than 1,000 entertainment content outputs.

From concept planning to production, development, cinematography, 2D / 3D, editing and color corrections, Being the only company in Korea to be able to provide all those services based on our one-stop solution method.
We offer a high level of visual work with strong teamwork from each field of expertise.
We are currently producing content with partners worldwide including Asia.

title: GLOBAL
ENTERTAINMENT
comment: We are a Joint venture, working together not only with the best music production teams in Korea but also with world-famous producers from countries such as Sweden, UK and USA.
We are expanding our business to the fields of global contents business, differentiated visual directing, artist concept establishment, idol production consulting & training,

title: NEW MEDIA CONTENTS
comment: We are producing a number of digital video contents suitable for mobile and internet environments.

We also operate channels that include YouTube broadcasts, micro-movies, web dramas, and snack content through collaborative content creation with companies, entertainment content and global platform providers.

title: CREATIVE SUPPORT
comment: We support multiple production and post production processes with the technical staff who have many years of experience and high-end professional equipment.
It has become the best supporter in the field with its shooting personnel, lighting equipment and manpower, post-production editing, color grading, 2D & 3D graphics production, studio for shooting.

title: CREATIVE R&D
comment: We analyze content trends and research various content creation methods.

We are developing new styles of video contents, testing new image techniques such as Virtual Reality (VR) production, Drone shooting, and also developing and executing training programs for overseas creators.
